name: supertitle
description: The smaller title to display above the main hero title.

name: title
description: The main title of the hero. If set, then `headingLevel` also needs to be set.

name: headingLevel
description: The heading level which represents an element from `<h1>` through to `<h6>`. Default is `1`.

name: headingSize
description: The physical size of the hero title (`xl`, `l`, `m` or `s`). Default is `xl`.

name: imageSources
description: Alternative sources of the image which can include WebP files.

name: actions
description: An array of actions to add at the bottom of the hero component. Each action is displayed as a button.

params.name: title
params.description: An optional title for the action.

params.name: icon
params.description: The name of a Font Awesome icon, without the prefixed `fa-`.

params.name: rightAlignIcon
params.description: If true, align the icon to the right hand side of the button.

params.name: classes
params.description: Classes to add to the hero action.

params.name: attributes
params.description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the hero action.

name: style
description: The style of hero to use. This can be `contrast`, `tint` or `accent`.

name: classes
description: Classes to add to the hero.

name: attributes
description: HTML attributes (for example data attributes) to add to the hero.
